content: TE-S FM Flat chisels Ultra-robust TE-S flat chisel bits for chipping/channeling into concrete and masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultra-robust – inductive hardening makes these flat chisels especially resistant to mushrooming, wear and bending Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our chisels are made to power through your most demanding demolition work Applications Chiseling or chipping concrete, brick or block Shallower channeling in concrete For use with TE-S electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-S Length: 14.2 in Width: 1.2 in Technical Data | Connection end | TE-S | Width | 1.2 in | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 2429827 - Flat chisel TE-S FM 36 - Package Size 1 pc - 2452294 - Flat chisel TE-S FM 36 MP3 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3x Flat chisel TE-S FM 36
